# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Stone Furnace at position (52.0, -84.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (52.0, -84.0) with 50 coal in its fuel inventory.

### Stone Furnace at position (52.0, -82.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (52.0, -82.0) with 43 coal in its fuel inventory.

### Stone Furnace at position (52.0, -80.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (52.0, -80.0) with 48 coal in its fuel inventory.

### Stone Furnace at position (52.0, -54.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (62.0, -54.0) with 19 coal in its fuel inventory and 1 stone in its source inventory.

### Lab at position (0.5, 0.5)
Consists of a lab at position (0.5, 0.5) with 50 automation-science-packs in its input inventory.

### Steam Engine at position (5.5, 0.5)
Consists of a steam engine at position (5.5, 0.5) with multiple pipes and small electric poles connected to it.

### Offshore Pump at position (-7.5, 25.5)
Consists of an offshore pump at position (-7.5, 25.5) with multiple pipes connected to it.

### Pipe Group at position (-0.5, -2.5)
Consists of multiple pipes connected to each other, forming a fluid system.

### Pipe Group at position (5.5, 7.5)
Consists of multiple pipes connected to each other, forming an empty fluid system.

### Pipe Group at position (-0.5, 13.5)
Consists of multiple pipes connected to each other, forming an empty fluid system.

### Electricity Group at position (7.5, 0.5)
Consists of multiple small electric poles connected to each other, forming an electricity network.


# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items from a furnace
* Make sure the furnace contains the item you are trying to extract.
* Ensure the furnace is not empty or does not have any warnings.

### Errors when inserting items into a furnace
* Make sure you have the item in your inventory before trying to insert it into the furnace.
* Ensure the furnace is not full and has enough space for the item.

### Errors when inserting items into an inventory
* Make sure you have the item in your inventory before trying to insert it.
* Ensure the inventory is not full and has enough space for the item.

### Errors when using offshore pump
* Make sure the offshore pump is connected to a pipe and has a valid fluid system.

### Errors when using steam engine
* Make sure the steam engine is connected to a pipe and has a valid fluid system.
* Ensure the steam engine is receiving power from the electricity network.

### Errors when using lab
* Make sure the lab is receiving power from the electricity network.
* Ensure the lab has a valid input inventory and research setup.
